video.title: Roswell
video.synopsis: In Roswell, New Mexico, human-alien hybrids guard their true identities while forging romances with classmates and discovering their destiny.

episodes.synopsis: High school student Liz Porter's life irreversibly transforms after she is shot, and a friend miraculously heals the wound, revealing his true nature.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Liz suspects the new substitute teacher, Ms. Topolsky, is an alien hunter after spying her with Michael's file. Michael steals a key from the Sheriff.
episodes.title: The Morning After

episodes.synopsis: Max, Isabel and Michael worry Maria may reveal their secret to Sheriff Valenti, so Isabel invades Maria's dreams to determine her trustworthiness.
episodes.title: Monsters

episodes.synopsis: Liz's grandmother suffers a bad stroke, and Liz remains with her at the hospital. Kyle's friends beat Max, forcing Liz to make a difficult decision.
episodes.title: Leaving Normal

episodes.synopsis: Liz considers many suspects in the disappearance of her secret journal -- in which she describes how Max used his alien powers to save her life.
episodes.title: Missing

episodes.synopsis: Liz and Maria travel with aliens to investigate a geodesic dome that may explain their origin. Michael discovers the importance of Valenti's key.
episodes.title: 285 South

episodes.synopsis: Liz and Max travel to an Indian reservation and find answers about the mysterious fourth alien. Maria and Michael can't ignore their attraction.
episodes.title: River Dog

episodes.synopsis: While Max lies injured in the hospital after an accident, Liz and the gang substitute his blood with Alex's so Max's identity will not be revealed.
episodes.title: Blood Brother

episodes.synopsis: A winter heat wave sparks unlikely romantic couplings, including a surprising matchup for Isabel. Liz confesses to Alex about Max, Isabel and Michael.
episodes.title: Heat Wave

episodes.synopsis: At the Indian reservation, Michael becomes gravely ill after undergoing a mystic sweat ritual, requiring all his friends to band together to save him.
episodes.title: The Balance

episodes.synopsis: Max uses his powers to save his adopted mother from a fire, forcing Max and Isabel to consider telling their mother about their true origins.
episodes.title: The Toy House

episodes.synopsis: The aliens and Sheriff Valenti race to a recent possible extraterrestrial landing site. Michael suspects River Dog is hiding his true identity.
episodes.title: Into the Woods

episodes.synopsis: When the annual UFO convention comes to town, Max is threatened by a man who wants to expose him and another who wants to kill him.
episodes.title: The Convention

episodes.synopsis: Liz wins a contest and goes on a date with a dark-haired man from an exotic place; Max and Kyle get drunk. Michael and Isabel try to contact Nasedo.
episodes.title: Blind Date

episodes.synopsis: Michael takes action after his alcoholic father's abuse becomes physical, causing Michael to become a suspect in his father's disappearance.
episodes.title: Independence Day

episodes.synopsis: Max's kissing sessions with Liz produce flashes from his past that lead toward another clue to his origin. Michael and Maria want visions too.
episodes.title: Sexual Healing

episodes.synopsis: Ms. Topolsky returns to Roswell, warning the aliens and their friends and convinces Michael to meet with her. A new girl at school befriends Isabel.
episodes.title: Crazy

episodes.synopsis: The aliens and their friends don't trust Tess, but Max is strangely and uncontrollably drawn to her, as Liz watches. The gang uncovers the truth.
episodes.title: Tess, Lies and Videotape

episodes.synopsis: The aliens and their friends speculate Tess is the dangerous shape-shifter, Nasedo. Isabel and Michael experience intense dreams about each other.
episodes.title: Four Square

episodes.synopsis: Tess tells the aliens more about Nasedo, who, hoping to entrap government special agents, shape-shifts into Max and kidnaps Liz. A new deputy arrives.
episodes.title: Max to the Max

episodes.synopsis: Nasedo and Tess team up with Michael and Isabel to track down a captured Max, who is subjected to torture by Agent Pierce and the FBI's special unit.
episodes.title: The White Room

episodes.synopsis: The aliens and their human friends elude the FBI. The foursome discovers their destiny -- a future that does not include the humans or life on Earth.
episodes.title: Destiny

episodes.synopsis: The aliens and their human allies assist Michael after he is arrested for Agent Pierce's murder. Despite his destiny with Tess, Max pursues Liz.
episodes.title: Skin and Bones

episodes.synopsis: When Max assumes leadership after enemy aliens kill Nasedo, he commands all to return to normal routines, but several suspicious newcomers arrive.
episodes.title: Ask Not

episodes.synopsis: Isabel's birthday party is interrupted when one of the Skins captures Tess. Michael discovers an interesting file at Congresswoman Whitaker's office.
episodes.title: Surprise

episodes.synopsis: Michael interviews a World War II veteran who tells him a detailed story about the government's cover-up of the alleged alien landing in 1947.
episodes.title: Summer of '47

episodes.synopsis: An older Max time-travels to the present from 14 years in the future, warning Liz to break up with him to save the world, as many lives are at stake.
episodes.title: The End of the World

episodes.synopsis: Congresswoman Whitaker's death leads the teen aliens to a gathering of Skins, where enemy aliens plan to take on new bodies. Courtney favors Michael.
episodes.title: Harvest

episodes.synopsis: The Skins cause all the humans in Roswell to disappear so they can more easily hunt down the royal aliens. Courtney heroically protects the Granilith.
episodes.title: Wipeout!

episodes.synopsis: The four aliens from the second group of pods -- appearing much like punk versions of the Royal Four -- come to Roswell to meet their counterparts.
episodes.title: Meet the Dupes

episodes.synopsis: Max, Tess, Lonnie and Rath travel to New York to attend a home star system leaders meeting. Confirmed as a true king, Max makes a critical decision.
episodes.title: Max in the City

episodes.synopsis: When Max fails to save a man who died while rescuing his daughter, Max is haunted by the man and tries to make amends. Isabel enjoys holiday spirit.
episodes.title: A Roswell Christmas Carol

episodes.synopsis: Isabel receives disturbing flashes from an unknown girl who has been buried alive near Roswell, while Valenti's old friend questions him about Max.
episodes.title: To Serve and Protect

episodes.synopsis: Sheriff Valenti risks his job when he helps the kids search for Laurie Dupree, who had been locked away in a mental institution before her abduction.
episodes.title: We Are Family

episodes.synopsis: Laurie escapes from medical attendants and grudgingly joins Michael and Maria to search for clues to her past. Agent Duff needs Valenti's assistance.
episodes.title: Disturbing Behavior

episodes.synopsis: Laurie discovers she is heir to the Dupree family estate, but the kidnapper strikes before she is able to act on the news, and Michael must save her.
episodes.title: How the Other Half Lives

episodes.synopsis: Feeling sullied by the $50,000 hush money the Duprees gave him, Michael and the gang travel to Las Vegas to spend it. Max contemplates marrying Liz.
episodes.title: Viva Las Vegas

episodes.synopsis: With prom night fast approaching, the hearts of Roswell High's lovestruck students lead them in unexpected directions as they face their feelings.
episodes.title: Heart of Mine

episodes.synopsis: One of the gang dies in a car accident, and the others try to understand how and why he died. When Valenti suggests suicide, Liz investigates.
episodes.title: Cry Your Name

episodes.synopsis: Liz continues to investigate Alex's death. Her leading theory involves alien foul play, but she unintentionally risks her alien friends' secret.
episodes.title: It's Too Late, and It's Too Bad

episodes.synopsis: Max learns that Tess is carrying his baby, but the Earth's atmosphere is affecting the child. Liz, Maria and Michael discover Alex's new secret.
episodes.title: Baby, It's You

episodes.synopsis: After an accident causes Larek's memories to intrude upon Brody's mind, he takes several people, including Max and Tess, hostage in the UFO center.
episodes.title: Off the Menu

episodes.synopsis: As the aliens quickly prepare to leave for their home planet, Max is determined to find the identity of Alex's killer, but the answer may hurt him.
episodes.title: The Departure

episodes.synopsis: Max and Liz are caught robbing a store that lies above an underground government storage facility housing the aliens' spaceship. Isabel has an affair.
episodes.title: Busted

episodes.synopsis: Michael takes a job as a security guard at a pharmaceutical company and befriends his co-workers -- but winds up getting his entire crew fired.
episodes.title: Michael, the Guys and the Great Snapple Caper

episodes.synopsis: Isabel and Jesse contemplate marriage, while Michael's new friends make Maria jealous. Liz discovers why her dad is against her relationship with Max.
episodes.title: Significant Others

episodes.synopsis: Max travels to Los Angeles in search of a shapeshifter who may help find his son. Max gets cast on the TV show "Enterprise" as, of course, an alien.
episodes.title: Secrets and Lies

episodes.synopsis: Max discovers the shapeshifter is the Royal Four's former guardian, who grudgingly helps Max look for the spaceship. Isabel has engagement problems.
episodes.title: Control

episodes.synopsis: Isabel and Jesse continue with wedding plans, despite interference from all corners, including Kivar, Isabel's former lover from her home planet.
episodes.title: To Have and to Hold

episodes.synopsis: Max and Michael crash Isabel and Jesse's honeymoon when they discover Kivar has come to Earth to retrieve her. Isabel has feelings for him.
episodes.title: Interruptus

episodes.synopsis: Maria's old boyfriend rekindles her interest in music and "normal" things while Max and Isabel's father grows suspicious of past strange events.
episodes.title: Behind the Music

episodes.synopsis: Max befriends a 7-year-old autistic boy, hoping his own child is communicating through the boy. Liz and Maria help Isabel in her holiday charity work.
episodes.title: Samuel Rising

episodes.synopsis: On New Year's Eve, most of the gang searches for a secret party while Liz hosts a party for senior citizens, where she meets an unlikely ally.
episodes.title: A Tale of Two Parties

episodes.synopsis: When an old reporter friend of Jesse's comes to visit Roswell, he begins to suspect that Jesse married an alien and starts writing an exposé.
episodes.title: I Married an Alien

episodes.synopsis: Liz suffers ill effects from Max healing her and cannot be near him. As Maria pursues career opportunities, Michael worries about their future.
episodes.title: Ch-ch-changes

episodes.synopsis: Maria and Liz leave Roswell to pursue their dreams. Michael enlists his friends' help in investigating his co-worker's murder and uncovers a secret.
episodes.title: Panacea

episodes.synopsis: Isabel fights for her life after being shot as Jesse tries to understand why her friends won't bring her to a hospital. Liz and Maria worry about Max.
episodes.title: Chant Down Babylon

episodes.synopsis: Max and Michael vie for the title of king. After Jesse consults a therapist to work out his feelings, the FBI recruits him to spy on the aliens.
episodes.title: Who Died and Made You King?

episodes.synopsis: Michael tries to save an Air Force pilot from being killed by military personnel attempting to cover up the man's collision with a UFO.
episodes.title: Crash

episodes.synopsis: Tess receives a cold welcome when she returns from Antar with Max's son, Zan -- and with the Air Force hot on their trail.
episodes.title: Four Aliens and a Baby

episodes.synopsis: The aliens realize that they are no longer safe in Roswell, and Liz discovers she has developed clairvoyant powers.
episodes.title: Graduation
